name: Basic Design System
description:
Complements is a basic design system that includes elements and components to create more consistent applications across different platforms. This design system includes typography, colors, buttons, text fields, tabs, selection controls, navigation bar, menu, list, card, icons, banners, dialogs, and snack-bars. These components are adaptable to in creating mobile applications, tablets and websites. 


This is my first publish to Figma community, hope this will help you to be efficient in implementing your digital products.
